Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 35 On the other hand , Li and co-workers employed the difluoro-substituted thiopheneconjugated side chain to construct bi(alkyl-difluorothienyl)benzodithiophene-fluorobenzotriazole copolymer J91 , which was shown to exhibit superior cell performance than that of the Article nonfluorinated control polymer.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| difluoro-substituted thiopheneconjugated side chain |
| bi(alkyl-difluorothienyl)benzodithiophene-fluorobenzotriazole copolymer J91 |
| Article nonfluorinated control polymer |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| difluoro-substituted thiopheneconjugated side chain |
| bi(alkyl-difluorothienyl)benzodithiophene-fluorobenzotriazole copolymer J91 |

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "Article" (as it is not a material name)
* "nonfluorinated" (as it is not a material name)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
